segments.text: when do most children start school in your country ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: In America , most children start primary school at the age of five .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How much time do primary school students usually spend at school every day ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Kindergarten students usually only go to school for about four hours every day , but after that , they spend about eight hours in school every day .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: do they have to go to school on Saturdays ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: no , most children in America only go to school Monday through Friday .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: how many subjects do they have to study ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: In most schools , they study about nine subjects .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: do students have to wear uniforms in schools in America ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: some private schools require their students to wear uniforms , but public schools don't .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: did you go to a public school or a private school ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I went to a private school for elementary school and university , but went to a public school for high school . What about you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I went to a boarding school from nursery school to senior high school .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: did you have to wear uniforms ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: yes , they were horrible . We had to wear green every day !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: at least you didn't waste time thinking about what you were going to wear every day !
segments.speaker: S2
